content: ​are you looking for a free crochet baby bolero pattern that is both elegant and easy to follow this top-down shell shrug is the perfect handmade gift for baby showers christenings or newborn photo props designed specifically for a 0-3 month size with tips for newborns this delicate cardigan features a classic pineapple-style shell and a dainty ribbon closure ​using dk weight yarn and a 4mm hook this one-piece construction means no seaming is required whether you are a beginner looking to practice the shell or an advanced crocheter needing a quick beautiful project this vintage-style baby bolero is a must-make
